name: CodeStory
headline: Aide is an AI-native , privacy-first IDE built on top of VSCode
description:
We're building Aide, an AI-native IDE designed for engineers to enjoy problem-solving with agents by their side.

We're currently a team of two, based in London, United Kingdom. Between us, we have been tech leads with experience building testing infrastructure at Meta, payment systems for 150k merchants in India, been an ACM ICPC world finalist and Open-Source contributor to critical infrastructure including gRPC and the Bazel build system. We love dev tooling, and enjoy thinking about the future of programming.

founders.name: Sandeep Pani, Founder
founders.description:
Currently building CodeStory. I have worked extensively in the devtooling and AI space for the last 5 years as the tech-lead for testing infrastructure at Meta and as the founding engineer for Findly.ai (YC S22).
Passionate about making developers more productive and want to build for a world where developers have powerful AI agents working together to ship more value.

I love making computers do things. üëæ

founders.name: Naresh Ramesh, Founder
founders.description: Currently building CodeStory, an AI-native IDE designed for engineers to enjoy problem-solving with agents by their side. I've built payments infrastructure to handle 150k merchants and scaled an engineering team from 5 to 35.

# Take Control Ship Your Vision
Spawn self-managing AI Agents on your codebase, iterate on GitHub PRs, and get reliable updates‚Äîall without the overhead of engineering management.
Schedule a Demo

### Spawn Agents on Your Codebase
Automate tasks, fix bugs, and implement new features without expanding your dev team
Install via CLI or web UI in minutes
No specialized infrastructure needed
Secure and controlled access
### Iterate via GitHub PRs

### Set Time Budgets

generated_description:
**Company Name:** CodeStory  
**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** London, United Kingdom  
**Team Size:** 4 employees  
**Batch:** Y Combinator Batch S23  
**Group Partner:** Michael Seibel  
**Website:** [aide.dev](https://aide.dev)  
**Sector:** Developer Tools, AI  

### Mission  
At CodeStory, we're all about building a groundbreaking, AI-native Integrated Development Environment (IDE) called Aide. Designed with privacy in mind, Aide enhances the coding experience on top of VSCode, making problem-solving a collaborative effort with AI agents right by your side.

### Founders‚Äô Background  
We‚Äôre a small team of two with a wealth of experience in tech. Our backgrounds include:
- Leading technical projects at Meta.
- Developing payment systems for over 150,000 merchants in India.
- Competing as ACM ICPC world finalists.
- Contributing to critical open-source projects like gRPC and Bazel.  

We are passionate about developer tooling and we're dedicated to shaping the future of programming.

### What We Do  
CodeStory is committed to transforming how developers manage their code. Here‚Äôs how Aide works:

- **Spawn Agents:** Quickly set up self-managing AI agents that can automate tasks, fix bugs, and implement new features without needing to expand your team. You can get started in minutes‚Äîno special infrastructure required.

- **GitHub Integration:** Our agents streamline collaboration by automating the process of opening, updating, and merging Pull Requests. Say goodbye to endless review cycles.

- **Time Budgets:** You can set clear task budgets for your AI agents, ensuring work is done efficiently and predictably.

### Why It Matters  
In a world where time is the most valuable resource, Aide allows developers to exercise control over their projects without the traditional strings attached, allowing them to focus on what they do best: creating innovative solutions.

So if you're a developer looking to supercharge your coding experience and embrace the future of programming, CodeStory‚Äôs Aide is the tool you‚Äôve been waiting for. 

Check out our website for a deeper dive: [aide.dev](https://aide.dev).
